text: Bidyut camake tadera drstisakti kere neyara upakrama haya [1]. Yakhana'i bidyutaloka tadera samane udbhasita haya takhana'i tara patha cale ebam yakhana andhakare dheke yaya takhana tara tham‌ke damraya [2]. Allah‌ icche karale tadera srabana o drstisakti harana karate parena. Niscaya allah‌ sabakichura upara ksamatabana
